doctor.name: Dr. Sajib Chandra Sarkar
doctor.specialty: Brain, Nerve, Spine, Neuro Specialist & Surgeon
doctor.info: Dr. Sajib Chandra Sarkar is a Neurosurgeon in Barisal. His qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), MS (Neurosurgery). He is a Consultant (Neurosurgery) at Sher-E-Bangla Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Popular Diagnostic Center, Barisal. Practicing hour of Dr. Sajib Chandra Sarkar at Popular Diagnostic Center, Barisal is 3pm to 7pm (Saturday to Tuesday).
